Scholomance Academy.name: Desk Imp
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "I feel inky!"

Scholomance Academy.name: Lightning Bloom
Scholomance Academy.text: Refresh 2 Mana Crystals. Overload: (2)
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Curiously, this plant never blooms in the same place twice.

Scholomance Academy.name: Raise Dead
Scholomance Academy.text: Deal $3 damage to your hero. Return two friendly minions that died this game to your hand.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Technically, it’s just really late healing.

Scholomance Academy.name: Adorable Infestation
Scholomance Academy.text: Give a minion +1/+1. Summon a 1/1 Cub. Add a Cub to your hand.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Some cards are strong by sheer power; others draw strength from love.

Scholomance Academy.name: Animated Broomstick
Scholomance Academy.text: Rush Battlecry: Give your other minions Rush.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "Blimey, that's a Stratocumulus 1000!"

Scholomance Academy.name: Athletic Studies
Scholomance Academy.text: Discover a Rush minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: It's a quick read.

Scholomance Academy.name: Brain Freeze
Scholomance Academy.text: Freeze a minion. Combo: Also deal $3 damage to it.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "The professor called on me, and I totally froze!"

Scholomance Academy.name: Carrion Studies
Scholomance Academy.text: Discover a Deathrattle minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: A good read but a little too much fluff.

Scholomance Academy.name: Demon Companion
Scholomance Academy.text: Summon a random Demon Companion.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Owning a pet can be real hell at times.

Scholomance Academy.name: Demonic Studies
Scholomance Academy.text: Discover a Demon. Your next one costs (1) less.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "Do you wanna summon a demon? I wanna summon a demon!"

Scholomance Academy.name: Devolving Missiles
Scholomance Academy.text:
[x]Shoot three missiles
at random enemy minions
that transform them into
ones that cost (1) less.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Most intermural spell-dueling contests end with a field of wisps.

Scholomance Academy.name: Double Jump
Scholomance Academy.text: Draw an Outcast card from your deck.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: The key to every speed run.

Scholomance Academy.name: Draconic Studies
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Discover a Dragon. Your next one costs (1) less.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Our Draconic Studies program has a high rate of burnout.

Scholomance Academy.name: Felosophy
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Copy the lowest Cost Demon in your hand. Outcast: Give both +1/+1.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "Like, isn't evil subjective man?"

Scholomance Academy.name: First Day of School
Scholomance Academy.text: Add 2 random 1-Cost minions to your hand.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "Report to the bookstore to buy your books, the alchemist to buy your potions, and then get your wands at the… wandryroom?"

Scholomance Academy.name: Frazzled Freshman
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "Late to bed, early to rise, makes a student unable to open her eyes."

Scholomance Academy.name: Intrepid Initiate
Scholomance Academy.text: Spellburst: Gain +2_Attack.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: How you like them apples?

Scholomance Academy.name: Lab Partner
Scholomance Academy.text: Spell Damage +1
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "Professor, a gnome burned my homework!"

Scholomance Academy.name: Nature Studies
Scholomance Academy.text: Discover a spell. Your next one costs (1) less.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "I have a first edition! Go ahead, count the rings."

Scholomance Academy.name: Overwhelm
Scholomance Academy.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Deal one more damage for each Beast you control.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Scholomance student Brewfest prank gone terribly, terribly awry.

Scholomance Academy.name: Partner Assignment
Scholomance Academy.text: Add a random 2-Cost and 3-Cost Beast to_your hand.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: In every group assignment, someone does all the legwork.

Scholomance Academy.name: Pen Flinger
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion. Spellburst: Return this to_your hand.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: The pen is also a more aerodynamic short-range projectile than the sword.

Scholomance Academy.name: Primordial Studies
Scholomance Academy.text: Discover a Spell Damage minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: A long forgotten tome whose very essence seeps of magic. 40 dust, used.

Scholomance Academy.name: Secret Passage
Scholomance Academy.text: Replace your hand with 4 cards from your deck. Swap back next turn.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: I use this to sneak out at night and do some villainous baking in the kitchen.

Scholomance Academy.name: Shield of Honor
Scholomance Academy.text: Give a damaged minion +3 Attack and Divine Shield.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "Sir, this shield would've been more helpful last turn!"

Scholomance Academy.name: Sphere of Sapience
Scholomance Academy.text:
[x]At the start of your turn,
look at your top card. You
can put it on the bottom
_and lose 1 Durability.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: This is what it sounds like when spheres scry.

Scholomance Academy.name: Spirit Jailer
Scholomance Academy.text: Battlecry: Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "Sure, they're in your deck, but the mind is like, the REAL prison."

Scholomance Academy.name: Tour Guide
Scholomance Academy.text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power costs (0).
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "Here is the original blueprint for the Academy grounds! Don't mind those so-called dark chambers… They'll be at the end of the tour."

Scholomance Academy.name: Trueaim Crescent
Scholomance Academy.text: After your Hero attacks a minion, your minions attack it too.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: You could have just pointed.

Scholomance Academy.name: Wand Thief
Scholomance Academy.text: Combo: Discover a Mage_spell.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "What’re ya buyin’?”

Scholomance Academy.name: Wave of Apathy
Scholomance Academy.text: Set the Attack of all enemy minions to 1 until your next turn.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "Flavor text? Eh. Can’t be bothered."

Scholomance Academy.name: Wolpertinger
Scholomance Academy.text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Scholomance student Brewfest prank gone awry.

Scholomance Academy.name: Argent Braggart
Scholomance Academy.text: Battlecry: Gain Attack and Health to match the highest in the battlefield.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Not sure why he's bragging, he's got the same stats as the next guy.

Scholomance Academy.name: Boneweb Egg
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon two 2/1 Spiders. If you discard this, trigger its Deathrattle.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Noblegarden is going to be really exciting this year!

Scholomance Academy.name: Cram Session
Scholomance Academy.text: Draw $1 |4(card, cards) (improved by Spell Damage).
Scholomance Academy.flavor: The font of the arcane gives nearly limitless access to power and energy! But it can't keep you awake, for that we still use coffee.

Scholomance Academy.name: Cult Neophyte
Scholomance Academy.text: Battlecry: Your opponent's spells cost (1) more next_turn.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Make a new recruit's deficiencies your efficiencies.

Scholomance Academy.name: Diligent Notetaker
Scholomance Academy.text: Spellburst: Return the spell to your hand.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: You never know what cards are going to be on the test.

Scholomance Academy.name: Gibberling
Scholomance Academy.text: Spellburst: Summon a Gibberling.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "As a Linguistics student I have studied the Gibberlings. I have determined they are speaking Gibberish."

Scholomance Academy.name: In Formation!
Scholomance Academy.text: Add 2 random Taunt minions to your hand.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: None can doubt the strength of the Scholomance student body.

Scholomance Academy.name: Manafeeder Panthara
Scholomance Academy.text: Battlecry: If you've used your Hero Power this turn, draw a card.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Feeds on mana, crystal kibble, and whatever it was you were just snacking on.

Scholomance Academy.name: Plagiarize
Scholomance Academy.text: Secret: At the end of your opponent's turn, add copies of the cards they played to your hand.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Copying is just using your resources wisely.

Scholomance Academy.name: Power Word: Feast
Scholomance Academy.text: Give a minion +2/+2. Restore it to full Health at the end of this turn.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Some people are here for the stellar, world-renowned academic program. Others are here for the buffet.

Scholomance Academy.name: Rune Dagger
Scholomance Academy.text: After your hero attacks, gain Spell Damage +1 this turn.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Turns out being stabbed makes you more vulnerable to magic.

Scholomance Academy.name: Sneaky Delinquent
Scholomance Academy.text: Stealth. Deathrattle: Add a 3/1 Ghost with Stealth to your hand.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: All right, now open your lid and say "Ahh!"

Scholomance Academy.name: Soul Shear
Scholomance Academy.text:
[x]Deal $3 damage to a
minion. Shuffle 2 Soul
Fragments into your deck.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "Just a little off the sides please."

Scholomance Academy.name: Transfer Student
Scholomance Academy.text: This has different effects based on which game board you're on.
Scholomance Academy.flavor:
Oh, the places you'll go!
There is so much to fight!
There are boards to be explored.
There are dreams to take flight.
Scholomance Academy.howToGet: Earnable after opening a Scholomance Academy card pack.
Scholomance Academy.howToGetGold: Solve the mystery of Transfer Student's origins.

Scholomance Academy.name: Trick Totem
Scholomance Academy.text: At the end of your turn, cast a random spell that costs (3) or less.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: It knows how to sit still and do tricks. Still working on rolling over, though.

Scholomance Academy.name: Wandmaker
Scholomance Academy.text: Battlecry: Add a 1-Cost spell from your class to_your hand.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: She creates incredibly affordable wands of all shapes and sizes. But not owls. The owl is all-natural.

Scholomance Academy.name: Ace Hunter Kreen
Scholomance Academy.text: Your other characters are Immune while attacking.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: This grandmaster marksman loves winning tournaments and eating a bit of ice cream.

Scholomance Academy.name: Bloated Python
Scholomance Academy.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/4 Hapless Handler.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: This is why Scholomance engineering students prefer C++.

Scholomance Academy.name: Ceremonial Maul
Scholomance Academy.text: Spellburst: Summon a Student with Taunt and stats equal to the spell's Cost.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: For the most discerning of hall monitors.

Scholomance Academy.name: Coerce
Scholomance Academy.text: Destroy a damaged minion. Combo: Destroy any minion.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "Give me your lunch money, or the sandwich gets it!"

Scholomance Academy.name: Combustion
Scholomance Academy.text:
[x]Deal $4 damage to
a minion. Any excess
damages both neighbors.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Sally is friends with three Silverhand Recruits conveniently standing in a line. After casting this spell, how many friends does she have left? (Show your work.)

Scholomance Academy.name: Educated Elekk
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Whenever a spell is played, this minion remembers it. Deathrattle: Shuffle the spells into your deck.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "This reminds me of a saying. 'An elekk never…' something. I can't remember."

Scholomance Academy.name: Enchanted Cauldron
Scholomance Academy.text: Spellburst: Cast a random spell of the same Cost.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Do you smell what the cauldron is cooking? If so, we apologize.

Scholomance Academy.name: Firebrand
Scholomance Academy.text: Spellburst: Deal 4 damage randomly split among all_enemy minions.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Too cool for school, too hot for thought.

Scholomance Academy.name: Gift of Luminance
Scholomance Academy.text: Give a minion Divine Shield, then summon a_1/1 copy of it.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: You get a small version of yourself in a snow globe to remember the moment.

Scholomance Academy.name: Goody Two-Shields
Scholomance Academy.text: Divine Shield Spellburst: Gain Divine Shield.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: These are my shields. There are at least two like them, and both are mine.

Scholomance Academy.name: Instructor Fireheart
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell that costs (1) or more. If you play it this turn, repeat this effect.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: When you have fire in your heart, even death can't stop you.

Scholomance Academy.name: Lord Barov
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Battlecry: Set the Health of all other minions to 1. Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Alexei Barov stayed at Scholomance despite leasing it to Kel’Thuzad. He says it’s for "supervision."

Scholomance Academy.name: Magehunter
Scholomance Academy.text: Rush Whenever this attacks a minion, Silence it.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Hates waiting. Abhors chit chat. Fond of the color purple.

Scholomance Academy.name: Mindrender Illucia
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Battlecry: Replace your hand with a copy of your opponent's until end of turn.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "…and that's how I ended up with a Murloc Cultural Studies major."

Scholomance Academy.name: Molten Blast
Scholomance Academy.text: Deal $2 damage. Summon that many 1/1 Elementals.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Well, how would YOU celebrate after finals week?!

Scholomance Academy.name: Playmaker
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]After you play a Rush minion, summon a copy _with 1 Health remaining.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "Here's the plan: you go left, I go right, and the wounded guy takes the hit."

Scholomance Academy.name: Professor Slate
Scholomance Academy.text: Your spells are Poisonous.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "Don’t worry, this will be over in a second. It might FEEL like an eternity, but I assure you, it’s quite quick!"

Scholomance Academy.name: Robes of Protection
Scholomance Academy.text: Your minions have "Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers."
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Warning: Robes of Protection are intended for targeted effects only and are not an effective defense against Flamestrike, Twisting Nether, or other AOE attacks.

Scholomance Academy.name: School Spirits
Scholomance Academy.text:
[x]Deal $2 damage to all
minions. Shuffle 2 Soul
Fragments into your deck.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "B-E A-G-G-R-E-S-S-I-V-E!"

Scholomance Academy.name: Self-Sharpening Sword
Scholomance Academy.text: After your hero attacks, gain +1 Attack.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: You no longer have to bring a stack of #2 swords to a test!

Scholomance Academy.name: Shadowlight Scholar
Scholomance Academy.text: Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to deal 3 damage.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Imagine having the power of soul magic and using it as a reading light.

Scholomance Academy.name: Shan'do Wildclaw
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Choose One - Give Beasts in your deck +1/+1; or Transform into a copy of a friendly Beast.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: She holds both an academic post and a scratching post.

Scholomance Academy.name: Shardshatter Mystic
Scholomance Academy.text: Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to deal 3 damage to all other minions.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Enjoys a good soul-crushing defeat.

Scholomance Academy.name: Speaker Gidra
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Rush, Windfury Spellburst: Gain Attack and Health equal to the spell's Cost.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: If a teacher lectures in a forest, does she even make a sound?

Scholomance Academy.name: Voracious Reader
Scholomance Academy.text: At the end of your turn, draw until you have 3 cards.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: But how much of it is skimming?

Scholomance Academy.name: Vulpera Toxinblade
Scholomance Academy.text: Your weapon has +2_Attack.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: The blade works well enough on its own… but this is just in case.

Scholomance Academy.name: Brittlebone Destroyer
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Battlecry: If your hero's Health changed this turn, destroy a minion.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Broke many a leg in drama class.

Scholomance Academy.name: Cabal Acolyte
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Taunt Spellburst: Gain control of a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: How did he get to the top of his class? He pulled a few strings!

Scholomance Academy.name: Crimson Hothead
Scholomance Academy.text: Spellburst: Gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Has a real passion for spelling.

Scholomance Academy.name: Disciplinarian Gandling
Scholomance Academy.text:
[x]After you play a minion,
destroy it and summon a
4/4 Failed Student.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "He doesn’t grade on a curve, but on a sharp spike instead."

Scholomance Academy.name: Divine Rager
Scholomance Academy.text: Divine Shield
Scholomance Academy.flavor: For when you need to rage, rage against the dying of the Light.

Scholomance Academy.name: Fishy Flyer
Scholomance Academy.text: Rush. Deathrattle: Add a_4/3 Ghost with Rush to_your hand.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Like a fish out of water.

Scholomance Academy.name: Glide
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Shuffle your hand into your deck. Draw 4 cards. Outcast: Your opponent does the same.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "Come with me, and you'll see, a whole new hand of possibly the same cards."

Scholomance Academy.name: Groundskeeper
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, restore 5 Health.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: It’s tricky for dryads to tend the garden without trampling the flowers.

Scholomance Academy.name: High Abbess Alura
Scholomance Academy.text: Spellburst: Cast a spell from your deck (targets this if possible).
Scholomance Academy.flavor: She's all about hitting the books. Literally.

Scholomance Academy.name: Infiltrator Lilian
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Stealth Deathrattle: Summon a 4/2 Forsaken Lilian that attacks a random enemy.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: She'll get to the bottom of this even if it kills her. Twice!

Scholomance Academy.name: Krolusk Barkstripper
Scholomance Academy.text: Spellburst: Destroy a random enemy minion.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: My friend went krolusk tipping once… once!

Scholomance Academy.name: Lorekeeper Polkelt
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Battlecry: Reorder your deck from the highest Cost card to the lowest Cost card.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: quicksort [] = [] quicksort (x:xs) = quicksort small ++ (x : quicksort large) where small = [y | y <- xs, y <= x] large = [y | y <- xs, y > x]

Scholomance Academy.name: Marrowslicer
Scholomance Academy.text: Battlecry: Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Perfect for killing the first boss in Icecrown Citadel.

Scholomance Academy.name: Potion of Illusion
Scholomance Academy.text: Add 1/1 copies of your minions to your hand. They cost (1).
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Unfortunately, there's no potion that can make you unsee all the faces in that bottle.

Scholomance Academy.name: Reaper's Scythe
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Spellburst: Also damages adjacent minions this turn.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Die. Die. Die.

Scholomance Academy.name: Shifty Sophomore
Scholomance Academy.text: Stealth Spellburst: Add a Combo card to your hand.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Experienced enough to do crimes, inexperienced enough to be super obvious about it.

Scholomance Academy.name: Star Student Stelina
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Outcast: Look at 3 cards in your opponent's hand. Shuffle one of them into their deck.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Cheating is just using your resources wisely.

Scholomance Academy.name: Steeldancer
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a random minion with Cost equal to your weapon's Attack.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Pretty powerful if you blade your cards right.

Scholomance Academy.name: Vilefiend Trainer
Scholomance Academy.text: Outcast: Summon two 1/1_Demons.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: My Vilefiend Trainers give me a much better sprint than my Air Gul'dans.

Scholomance Academy.name: Wretched Tutor
Scholomance Academy.text: Spellburst: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "If you like my tutoring, you'll love my sister the art therapist, my father the driver, and my mother the housekeeper."

Scholomance Academy.name: Wyrm Weaver
Scholomance Academy.text: Spellburst: Summon two 1/2 Mana Wyrms.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Studied basket weaving as an undergrad.

Scholomance Academy.name: Blessing of Authority
Scholomance Academy.text: Give a minion +8/+8. It_can't attack heroes this turn.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: A paladin fights with honor! We don't go face... until next turn!

Scholomance Academy.name: Blood Herald
Scholomance Academy.text: Whenever a friendly minion dies while this is in your hand, gain +1/+1.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "Red Blood, it gives you wings."

Scholomance Academy.name: Cutting Class
Scholomance Academy.text:
[x]Draw 2 cards.
Costs (1) less per Attack
of your weapon.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: When you actually are the sharpest tool in the shed.

Scholomance Academy.name: Doctor Krastinov
Scholomance Academy.text: Rush Whenever this attacks, give your weapon +1/+1.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: He is not a medical doctor.

Scholomance Academy.name: Headmaster Kel'Thuzad
Scholomance Academy.text: Spellburst: If the spell destroys any minions, summon them.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "You wish to know my secrets, hmm? I carry little bits of tuna in the sleeves of my robe, he loves that. Oh, you meant the risen dead? That was trivial, trivial."

Scholomance Academy.name: Jandice Barov
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two random 5-Cost minions. Secretly pick one that dies _when it takes damage.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Her parents own Scholomance. Of course she's going to play tricks on the students!
Scholomance Academy.howToGetDiamond: Obtained by owning 25 Scholomance Academy Legendary cards.

Scholomance Academy.name: Lake Thresher
Scholomance Academy.text:
Also damages the minions next to whomever
this attacks.
Scholomance Academy.flavor:
"There’s a monster in the lake?!" 
"That’s not a monster, that’s Gary."

Scholomance Academy.name: Mozaki, Master Duelist
Scholomance Academy.text: After you cast a spell, gain Spell Damage +1.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Treats her students like her peers, which means defeating them in one-sided duels all day long.

Scholomance Academy.name: Ogremancer
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Whenever your opponent casts a spell, summon a 2/2 Skeleton with Taunt.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: After their third attempt, Tharg began to suspect that Krul was summoning the skeletons on purpose.

Scholomance Academy.name: Ras Frostwhisper
Scholomance Academy.text: At the end of your turn, deal $1 damage to all enemies (improved by Spell Damage).
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Always the favorite of Headmaster Kel'Thuzad, Ras nonetheless received a chilly reception from the other faculty.

Scholomance Academy.name: Soulshard Lapidary
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to give your hero +5 Attack this turn.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Also known as a soul sequincer.

Scholomance Academy.name: Steward of Scrolls
Scholomance Academy.text: Spell Damage +1 Battlecry: Discover a spell.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Oh dang it, I spilled ink elemental all over my essay!

Scholomance Academy.name: Teacher's Pet
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a random 3-Cost Beast.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Really goes the extra mile to get the Hay+.

Scholomance Academy.name: Totem Goliath
Scholomance Academy.text: Deathrattle: Summon all four basic Totems. Overload: (1)
Scholomance Academy.flavor: It was an art project, and nobody knew when to stop.

Scholomance Academy.name: Twilight Runner
Scholomance Academy.text: Stealth Whenever this attacks, draw 2 cards.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Every morning you find two dead cards at your doorstep.

Scholomance Academy.name: Vectus
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps. Each gains a Deathrattle from your minions that died this game.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Don’t let that dark magic worry you. He’ll ensure they hatch without a scratch.

Scholomance Academy.name: Void Drinker
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Taunt. Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to gain +3/+3.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: It has no taste.

Scholomance Academy.name: Devout Pupil
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Divine Shield, Taunt Costs (1) less for each spell you've cast on friendly characters this game.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: He considers textbooks Light reading.

Scholomance Academy.name: Forest Warden Omu
Scholomance Academy.text: Spellburst: Refresh your Mana Crystals.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: She wishes all things could grow and flourish at Scholomance. If only she knew…

Scholomance Academy.name: Initiation
Scholomance Academy.text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. If that kills it, summon a new copy.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: The things a murloc's gotta go through to graduate from Scholomance…

Scholomance Academy.name: Judicious Junior
Scholomance Academy.text: Lifesteal
Scholomance Academy.flavor: She's judge, jury, and junior!

Scholomance Academy.name: Onyx Magescribe
Scholomance Academy.text: Spellburst: Add 2 random spells from your class to_your hand.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Sometimes you gotta spend spells to earn spells.

Scholomance Academy.name: Runic Carvings
Scholomance Academy.text: Choose One - Summon four 2/2 Treant Totems; or Overload: (2) to summon them with Rush.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "That totem was beautiful… and you runed it!"

Scholomance Academy.name: Smug Senior
Scholomance Academy.text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Add a_5/7 Ghost with Taunt to_your hand.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: You want to see something funny? Go visit him in five years.

Scholomance Academy.name: Sorcerous Substitute
Scholomance Academy.text: Battlecry: If you have Spell Damage, summon a copy of this.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: This substitute's substitution is a dangerous institution.

Scholomance Academy.name: Commencement
Scholomance Academy.text: Summon a minion from your deck. Give it Taunt and Divine Shield.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "Remember, graduates—you carry a heavy weight on your shoulders now."

Scholomance Academy.name: Cycle of Hatred
Scholomance Academy.text: Deal $3 damage to all minions. Summon a 3/3 Spirit for every minion killed.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: If you run 2 of these, would that make it the bi-cycle of hatred?

Scholomance Academy.name: Fel Guardians
Scholomance Academy.text: Summon three 1/2 Demons with Taunt. Costs (1) less whenever a_friendly minion dies.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: What happened after the guardians tripped? They Fel.

Scholomance Academy.name: Guardian Animals
Scholomance Academy.text: Summon two Beasts that cost (5) or less from your deck. Give_them Rush.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: The guidelines specifically state: "Students may also bring an ironbeak owl OR an alleycat OR a toad." They never said how big.

Scholomance Academy.name: Keymaster Alabaster
Scholomance Academy.text:
[x]Whenever your opponent
_draws a card, add a copy to_
_your hand that costs (1).
Scholomance Academy.flavor: The key to his mastery is a solid stack of backup copies.

Scholomance Academy.name: Soulciologist Malicia
Scholomance Academy.text: Battlecry: For each Soul Fragment in your deck, summon a 3/3 Soul with Rush.@ (@)
Scholomance Academy.flavor: If you value your life, don't call it a "soft science."

Scholomance Academy.name: Archwitch Willow
Scholomance Academy.text: Battlecry: Summon a random Demon from your hand and deck.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: One of the demons will do all the work while the other gets the same grade.

Scholomance Academy.name: Plagued Protodrake
Scholomance Academy.text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 7-Cost minion.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "What’s in the drake?! WHAT’S IN THE DRAKE?"

Scholomance Academy.name: Tidal Wave
Scholomance Academy.text: Lifesteal Deal $3 damage to all minions.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "Hang Four, mon!"

Scholomance Academy.name: Troublemaker
Scholomance Academy.text: At the end of your turn, summon two 3/3 Ruffians that attack random enemies.
Scholomance Academy.flavor:
"Prepare for trouble!"
"Make it double!"

Scholomance Academy.name: Turalyon, the Tenured
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Rush. Whenever this attacks a minion, set the defender's Attack and Health to 3.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "Let evil flee before righteousness; let the innocent live in peace. Let the day come when none need fear. For that day, I give my life gladly."

Scholomance Academy.name: Ancient Void Hound
Scholomance Academy.text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
steal 1 Attack and Health
from all enemy minions.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: What happened to my 1/1 Void Pup? And the glee club?!

Scholomance Academy.name: Rattlegore
Scholomance Academy.text: Deathrattle: Resummon this with -1/-1.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: He looks bad now, but he was pretty handsome in his 20/20s.

Scholomance Academy.name: Flesh Giant
Scholomance Academy.text: Costs (1) less for each time your hero's Health changed during your turns.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "A BIG mistake."

Scholomance Academy.name: Survival of the Fittest
Scholomance Academy.text: Give +4/+4 to all minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Sometimes the fittest is the one smart enough to not start a fight with seven 6/6 Treants.
